reviews.review: ver nice game go play its cery cool!!

It's like totally CSGO. You still get the old fashioned voiced chat banter that has been lost somewhat in the modern age. The game stays updated but can ran on most machines. I have a 3080 but I still appreciate having consideration for the every man. Which brings us to the next plus......It's free play!! although definitely get prime account because non prime is cancer! Unless you like cancer, in which case make a second account and play the non primes on that one.
Que juego poronga, y mirá que me encanta la poronga, pero detesto este juego.
